@eabroken2020 @WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency I was a regulator a kind while ago. We were taught that the point of the exercise was to help people act correctly, not to hassle them or worse still prosecute. Those outcomes were to be restricted to serial offenders who had no intention of complying. Accordingly, we advised..

@GarfieldWandle @WandleForum @thameswater Hello, please always report pollution to the @EnvAgency on 0800 80 70 60 and provide them with as much detail as you can r.e. the location and whether you can see any fish gasping at the surface etc. as well as taking some photos like this. text: @graphic_results @EnvAgencyMids I get asked this question a lot. Because the level of the river is controlled by the weir, removal of silt in the impoundment by the river gardens would make no difference to flood risk. In addition, the amount of silt is self governing and does not increase from year to year.
